DOC.brief_title: Epidemiologic Study Of The Distribution Of Vaccine-Type Streptococcus Pneumoniae Serotypes In Adults In The US With Community-Acquired Pneumonia
DOC.criteria: Age 50 year old . Presents study site clinically suspect pneumonia . Has radiographic find consistent pneumonia . Able willing provide urine . Transfer study hospital already hospitalize 48 hour inpatient facility ( community hospital ) . Hospitalacquired pneumonia ( ie , pneumonia develop 48 hour hospital admission ) . Previous enrollment study within past 30 day .
